title: Part 2: Building APIs with Django REST Framework
description: This part of the course equips you with the skills to build powerful APIs using Django REST Framework.

learning_outcomes.title: Introduction to RESTful APIs
learning_outcomes.content: Grasp the core concepts of RESTful APIs (Representational State Transfer) and their importance in modern web development.

learning_outcomes.title: Django REST Framework Fundamentals
learning_outcomes.content: Learn Django REST Framework, a powerful toolkit for building RESTful APIs on top of your Django applications. Explore serializers, views, and routers.

learning_outcomes.title: Serializers and Data Representation
learning_outcomes.content: Master serializers for converting Django models into JSON or other data formats for efficient API communication.

learning_outcomes.title: API Views and Endpoints
learning_outcomes.content: Learn to create various types of API views (ListAPIView, DetailView, etc.) to handle different types of API requests (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE).

learning_outcomes.title: Authentication and Permissions for APIs
learning_outcomes.content: Implement robust authentication and authorization mechanisms to secure your Django REST Framework APIs. Explore token-based authentication and user permissions.

learning_outcomes.title: Testing and Debugging APIs
learning_outcomes.content: Understand the importance of testing for APIs and explore tools and techniques for unit testing and integration testing your Django REST Framework APIs.

learning_outcomes.title: Advanced Topics
learning_outcomes.content: Delve into advanced topics like custom permissions, throttling, pagination, and integrating with third-party services to enhance your APIs.
